game_description: A Competitive VR Game, Inspired by "Fall Guys". Run, Jump, Climb, And do more! Cat Mania is a fun, competitive hand locomotion game! Compete in maps such as Gravity Bounce, Spin & Roll, and Way More! Follow the rules and have fun!
review_1: Any bad reviews saying that the Cat Mania creators are corrupt is ABSOLUTELY FALSE. The people that write these reviews are friends of the creator of Robo Run and the creator of that game is a Pedophile. If you see these reviews make sure you mark it unhelpful so it gets pushed down. This game is not a 5 Star but definitely 4.7 I would consider downloading it! All the mods here keep the game safe and they are also friendly! Just make sure you also join the discord! -MarkZeroYT
review_2: Even though i haven't played in a while, i remember this game being fun however some game modes do last a while due to people hiding but once those are over its fine. This is a very fun game and it's basically just vr fall guys with cats which makes it fun. 10/10 game would play again. (It's also good for weight loss because if you want to win you have to sweat really badly lol) -Noah O_O
review_3: But I can't join the discord
review_5: Here are some ideas for a Cat Mania VR game: 1. Cat Cafe: Create a virtual reality cat cafe where players can interact with cats in a cozy cafe setting. They can play with the cats, feed them, and even adopt one to take home! 2. Cat Show: Host a virtual cat show where players can enter their own cats or watch other players' cats compete in various categories such as cuteness, agility, and obedience. 3. Cat Adventure: Create a virtual world where players can explore and complete challenges with their cats. They can climb trees, chase mice, and even navigate through an obstacle course. 4. Cat Training: Create a virtual reality cat training simulation where players can teach their cats new tricks such as jumping, rolling over, and playing fetch. 5. Cat Rescue: Create a virtual reality game where players are tasked with rescuing cats from dangerous situations such as being stuck in trees or trapped in a building. Players must use their skills to safely rescue the cats and bring them to safety. I hope these ideas are helpful! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.
